21. Leave history tracking: The system keeps a record of all past leave requests, approvals, and denials, allowing employees and managers to view their leave history.
22. Emergency leave: The system allows employees to request emergency leave in case of unforeseen circumstances, with a streamlined process for quick approvals.
23. Customizable leave categories: The system allows for the creation of custom leave categories for different types of leave specific to the company's needs.
24. PTO Accruals: The system tracks and manages PTO accruals for each employee, ensuring compliance with legal requirements.
25. Leave calendar: The system has a leave calendar that allows employees and managers to view upcoming leave requests and approve or deny them accordingly.
26. Leave request form: The system has a customizable leave request form that employees can fill in to request leave.
27. Leave policy library: The system has a library of leave policies that managers and HR can access and update as needed.
28. Leave tracking dashboard: The system has a dashboard that allows managers and HR to view leave statistics and track leave usage across the company.
29. Leave request alerts: The system sends alerts to managers and HR when a leave request is submitted, approved, or denied.
30. Leave request approval routing: The system routes leave requests to the appropriate manager or HR representative for approval based on the employee's role and department.
